name: 1460 Pascal Atlas Leather lace Up Boots - Unisex

features:
Born on 01.04.60. Named the 1460. Over six decades, our 8-eye work boot has become iconic
Atlas is a classic waxed aniline leather with a subtle pull-up and slight sheen
Our Goodyear-welted lines are heat-sealed at 700°C and reinforced with our signature welt stitch
Material: Classic smooth, waxed leather colored with soluble dyes. With a subtle ombre and satin sheen finish.
Construction: Goodyear Welted
